name: Fluids
body:
### Abstract
A simple implementation of 2D "Stable Fluids" (see: http://www.autodeskresearch.com/pdf/ns.pdf) and a demo application simulating a flame.

[![Stable Fluids](http://img.youtube.com/vi/VasieWAYXfY/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VasieWAYXfY)

### Usage
The demo can be build using its Xcode project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
